abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid32278361, pmid32278368, pmid32278795, pmid32279023, pmid32278374, pmid32278546, pmid32278878, pmid32278370, pmid32278470, pmid32278811, pmid32278585, pmid32278860, pmid32279224, pmid32279286, pmid32279309, pmid32279450, pmid32278694, pmid32279115, pmid32278693, pmid32278756, pmid32279351, pmid32278755, pmid32278879, pmid32278797, pmid32279009, pmid32279219, pmid32278764, pmid32278372, pmid32278616, pmid32278726, pmid32279346, pmid32279462, pmid32279418, pmid32278364, pmid32278365, pmid32278542, pmid32278889, pmid32278371, pmid32279081, pmid32278369, pmid32278716, pmid32278366, pmid32278745
